Title: Requires businesses who offer delivery services to provide markings for their vehicles and drivers
Summary: Requires businesses who offer delivery services to provide markings for their vehicles and drivers; provides penalties for failing to do so.
LawCode: Add ยง1229-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring businesses that provide delivery services provide markings on both their motor vehicles and drivers that identify them as such
